values: Worship and the Shape of History | Pr Jan Prorok

Pastor Jeffery continues his previous conversation with Pastor Prorok about J.B. Jordan’s magisterial work Through New Eyes. They discuss the typological structure of history; overlapping structures in the Biblical narrative; death and resurrection; the fractal structure of history; the history of the Great Schism and the Reformation; Biblical eschatology and personal history; meditation and reframing; […]
